{"id":1312892932,"question_id":583,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1720359153,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"13 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1312892932/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"15.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int n=word1.size();\n        int m=word2.size();\n        vector<vector<int>>dp(n+1,vector<int>(m+1,0));\n        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){\n            for(int j=1;j<=m;j++){\n                if(word1[i-1]==word2[j-1]){\n                    dp[i][j]=max({1+dp[i-1][j-1],dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]});\n                }\n                else{\n                    dp[i][j]=max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return word1.size()-dp[n][m]+word2.size()-dp[n][m];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
